column4: does grub / Linux have any problems booting from logical (non-primary) partitions?  I don't think I've ever tried that...

garryfre: the official version: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AutomaticallyMountMSWindowsPartitions  and the latest version (soon to be official): http://ca.geocities.com/ic56@rogers.com/65/diskmounter-latest.txt
